abstract: The sequel to last year’s series covered the charges against the singer R. Kelly, threats to the women who spoke out against him and new details about his life and relationships.
lead_paragraph: In “Surviving R. Kelly,” a six-part documentary that aired last January, viewers came face-to-face with the women who said the R&B singer controlled them, abused them and assaulted them — in many cases, while they were underage.
keywords: Surviving R Kelly Part II: The Reckoning (TV Program)
